Package it.polimi.ingsw.remoteInterfaces

Interface GameSubscriber

All Superinterfaces:
ListenerSubscriber, Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionHandlerTCP, Game
public interface GameSubscriber extends ListenerSubscriber
the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the Game

    getSubscriberUsername

  • Method Details

    • notifyPlayerJoined

      void notifyPlayerJoined(String username) throws RemoteException
      This is used to notify when a new player has joined the game
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has joined
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyWinningPlayer

      void notifyWinningPlayer(String username, int points, Map<String,Integer> scoreboard) throws RemoteException
      This is used to notify when a player has won the game
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the winning player
      points - the points of the player that have won the game
      scoreboard - the total scoreboard, already ordered, the key is the username and the value the points of the user
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyCommonGoalCards

      void notifyCommonGoalCards(ArrayList<RemoteCommonGoalCard> commonGoalCards) throws RemoteException
      This is used to notify to a new player the common goals of the game
      Parameters:
      commonGoalCards - is the list of the common goals of the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyPlayerInTurn

      void notifyPlayerInTurn(String username) throws RemoteException
      This method is called to notify that it's change in the turn It updates the client
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player now in turn
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyPlayerCrashed

      void notifyPlayerCrashed(String userCrashed) throws RemoteException
      This method is called to notify that a player crashed It updates the client

      userCrashed - username of the crashed player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyTurnOrder

      void notifyTurnOrder(ArrayList<String> playerOrder) throws RemoteException
      This method is called to notify the turn order of the players It updates the client
      Parameters:
      playerOrder - list of the players of the game in order of turn
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

      This method specifies the list of the players that are already in the game when a client joins It updates the client
      Parameters:
      alreadyJoinedPlayers - set of the players already in the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
